OOC: Sorry, master. oops, that was OOC. Wait! I know!

BIC: Klant stares of=
f into the distance.

OOC: Fixed!...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  Fro=
m: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, July 20,=
 2001 10:28 PM
  Subject: End The !@#%ing OOCs


  THAT IS ENOUGH!

  Out o=
f the last 100+ posts, barely _10_ of them were IC. This is an RPG board, n=
ot a general discussion board. If you want to discus something, do it over =
private email or on the message board on the site.

  I don't know about ot=
her people, but I am sick as hell of the completely pointless OOCs on the R=
PG board. Lurker, you're a great RPer. Now shut up and take the compliment.=
 Dewey, this is a BW RPG. The moment I see a char with even a variation of =
"Goku" as his name, you'll regret it. In adition, stop moding. You can't ma=
ke other people's chars do things, you never posted for Mustex even attempt=
ing to get on Alliance Island, much less getting on it, you have no part in=
 the past of NBW, and can't change it at will. Your chars have no logical w=
ay of knowing about Zardus or Veratis, and its moding to have them have tha=
t insight. Either explain how they know or drop that storyline. It makes no=
 sence. Also, you never even landed that lowlife seller or whatever of your=
s on the planet, and I'm not going to write your profiles for you. Shape up=
. Read the rules and act by them. LegendaryNemasis, please stop commenting =
on every post. The council will catch it if its moding.

  Everyone else: s=
top the OOCs. Either write RPG posts, or don't post at all. I'm very sick o=
f coming home from work and reading through 100 or so damn OOC posts. I'm a=
bout ready to moderate anyone who sends an OOC ever again. I won't, but kee=
p in mind that I'm on the verge of turning into a very mean person.

  From=
 now on, use private email for pointless OOCs, or use the site's message bo=
ard. DO NOT clog up space on this board. I'm sick of it, as I said like 10 =
times already in this post.

  There. I'm through with my ranting. I really=
 hope the OOC messages stop. Its very hard for me to keep up with posts as =
it is, and all this pointless crap is starting to convince me not to even b=
other.


   

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.c=
om/info/terms/
